messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of the road in the clearing?
It is actually the road used by the truck
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How would you describe the character's demeanor?
don’t play him as a mindless zombie, but he should feel cold and lacking in emotion
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is the character on a geological survey with?
Carl White, under the direction of Mr. Strong
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is in charge of the geological survey?
Carl White, under the direction of Mr. Strong
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does Stanton suggest doing if the investigators reach the dig site/base camp?
He says it would be fine to visit them, 'Just follow the road and it will get you there eventually.'
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What determines if Eugene has spotted the investigators?
A group Luck roll
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What will Eugene do if he has spotted the investigators?
Fire a shot over their heads in an effort to scare them off
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many shots does Eugene have left after firing a warning shot?
Three
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What will happen to investigators trying to get the drop on Eugene without a successful Stealth roll?
They will be exposed and possibly a target
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if an investigator fails a roll?
will leave an investigator exposed and possibly a target
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if an investigator tries to flee the area?
will not be a target for Eugene
